title: 18.3 Worksheet
content:
« Worked Examples 18.3.1Interrupts and Real Time Worksheet » Concurrency and Synchronization This worksheet contains exercises for the lecture, selected from old quiz problems. If you can successfully answer the questions on the worksheet, you’ve mastered the material for the lecture! We’ve also included a link to the answers, but you’ll get the most out of the worksheet if you work on the exercises before reading the answers.
